channel.description: Recent content in author on IncludeHer

item.title: Author profile: Tegan
item.description: Name: Tegan Clark Field: Astrophysics/Climate Science Bio: I’m a 3rd year undergraduate student at the ANU studying Astrophysics but I have a keen interest in climate science and I’m hoping to pursue this further in postgrad study.

item.title: Author profile: Staci
item.description: Name: Staci Pearlman Field: Computational Chemistry and Science Communication Bio: I have just graduated from a Bachelor of Science at the Australian National University, with a major in chemistry.

item.title: Author profile: Andrew
item.description: Name: Andrew Battisti Field: Galaxy Evolution Bio: I am a Postdoctoral Fellow in the Research School of Astronomy and Astrophysics at the Australian National University.

item.title: Author profile: Bella
item.description: Name: Isabella Gerrard Field: Computational Star Formation Bio: I am currently a PhD candidate at the Australian National University (Canberra), originally from Bega NSW (yes, like the cheese!

item.title: Author profile: Isobel
item.description: Name: Isobel Romero-Shaw Field: Gravitational Wave Astrophysics Bio: I’m currently a PhD student at Monash university, Melbourne, Australia, but I was born and raised in the beautiful city of Bath, UK.
